name: Humanities and Social Sciences Scholars Forum
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Enrollment limited to participants in the Scholars of the College Program
description: Interdisciplinary seminar series with presentations by distinguished faculty members and experts drawn from technical, academic, business and government communities. Discussions of major public issues and topics of contemporary concern.

name: Humanities and Social Sciences Scholars Forum
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Enrollment limited to participants in the Scholars of the College Program
description: Interdisciplinary seminar series with presentations by distinguished faculty members and experts drawn from technical, academic, business and government communities. Discussions of major public issues and topics of contemporary concern.

name: Great Decisions
description: Discussion and investigation of major issues in contemporary American foreign policy selected annually by the Foreign Policy Association through its Great Decisions Program. Must be participants in the University Scholars Program. Must have completed three semesters of the Scholars Forum (USP 110/111). Must have GPA of at least 3.25.

name: Readings Inspired By the Scholars Forum
description: Seminar course for upper class University Scholars who have completed three semesters of the Scholars Forum, with readings drawn from upcoming Scholars Forum themes.
